page.title: 05NOTTINGHAM BROWNIES IN 1985
page.content: I go to{Brownies every Wednesday}from 5:00_6:45pm.I have been a Brownie for nearly 18 months.You can{join}when you are{7.}We meet at St. Andrew's Church Hall and{Brown Owl}and{Snowy Owl}are our{leaders.}They are adults.I am in the Sprite six.The other sixes are called Elves,Pixies and Imps. Brownies {started}in{1910}and the{uniform}was very{different}then.The skirts were much longer! At Brownies we{work} towards getting different{badges,} which we sew on our uniform.The most important badge is the{Promise Badge.} On Saturday June 8th.1985 we had a special{pageant}held at the Notts. County football ground for the{ {75th.anniversary}of the Guide Movement.Every Guide and Brownie pack in our area chose 2 people to take part.{I danced }in a "keep-fit" routine.
